job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field; master’s degree preferred.

jd: From: Sanjay Sunar, convextech sanjay@convextech.com Reply to: sanjay@convextech.com Position: Lead AWS Data Engineer Location: St Louis, MO or Charlotte, NC. Duration: Long Term Contract. Visa Restrictions: No H1b/CPT Interview: Video/Skype Job Description: Key Responsibilities:Design and Develop Data Solutions: Architect and implement robust data pipelines and ETL processes using AWS services like AWS Glue, Amazon Redshift, Amazon S3, or Amazon Kinesis.Data Architecture: Collaborate with stakeholders to define data requirements and design data models that support business objectives.Leadership: Lead a team of data engineers, providing mentorship and guidance in best practices for data engineering.Optimization: Monitor and optimize data processes for performance, cost, and scalability.Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other engineering teams to understand data needs and deliver solutions.Data Governance: Implement data governance and quality frameworks to ensure data integrity and compliance.Documentation: Maintain clear documentation of data architectures, processes, and workflows.Qualifications:Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field; master’s degree preferred.Experience: 5+ years of experience in data engineering, with a focus on AWS technologies. One of our clients is in need of a Lead AWS Data Engineer specializing in Redshift to assist with a Hadoop to Redshift migrations. Thanks and Regards Sanjay SunarUS IT Recruiter |Convex Tech Inc.Email: sanjay@convextech.comLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/santosh-kumar-sunar-419601178/
